title: Go Home 1.13.0
description: Allows the mob to move back to the position they were spawned.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

interval.description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal
interval.title: Interval

on_home.title: On Home
on_home.description: Event to run when this mob gets home.

on_failed.description: Event to run when this mob gets home.
on_failed.title: On Failed
